entries.name: Adi
entries.theka: ta ka dhi mi | ta ka dhi mi

entries.name: Chautal
entries.theka: dha dha dhin ta| kita dha dhin ta | tita kata gadee gena

entries.name: Dadra
entries.theka: dha dhin na |  dha tin na

entries.name: Dhamar
entries.theka: ka dhi ta dhi ta | dha - | ga ti ta | ti ta ta -

entries.name: Dipchandi
entries.theka: dha dhin - | dha dha dhin - | ta tin - | dha dha dhin na

entries.name: Ektal
entries.theka: dhin dhin dhage tirikiti | tu na kat ta | dhage tirikiti dhin na

entries.name: Jhaptal
entries.theka: dhin dha | dhin dhin dha | tin na | dhin dhin dha

entries.name: Keherwa
entries.theka: dha ge na ti | na ka dhin na

entries.name: Rupak
entries.theka: tin tin na | dhin na | dhin na

entries.name: Sitarkhani
entries.theka: dha* dhin*  dha | dha* dhin* dha | sha* tin* na | na* dhin* dha

entries.name: Tintal
entries.theka: dha dhin dhin dha | dha dhin dhin dha | dha tin tin ta | ta dhin dhin dha
